description:
Nagatoro makes a bet that Senpai has lewd books in the club room, but things don’t go quite as she plans. Sakura has a stalker, and she asks Senpai for help getting rid of him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est vraiment un cochon / Un gars aussi chelou peut pas gérer un rencard !
Senpai wa Musshiri Dashi!! / Kimo Kimo Senpai ga Matomo ni Date Dekiru Wake Naissho!!
Senpai`s Such a Closet Perv!! / There`s No Way Creepy Senpai Could Go on a Proper Date!!
センパイはムッツリだし!! / キモキモセンパイがまともにデート出来るわけ無いっしょ!!
